question.text: The aromatic polyurethane elastomeric polymer and used along with bitumen is:

solution.text:
Polyblend: A fine powder of recycled modified plastic was developed by Ahmed khan’s company. This mixture is mixed with the bitumen that is used to lay roads.
A plastic sack manufacturer in Bangalore has managed to find the ideal solution to the ever-increasing problem of accumulating plastic waste. He realised that plastic waste was a real problem.He proved that Polyblend and bitumen, when used to lay roads, enhanced the bitumen’s water repellant properties and helped to increase road life by a factor of three. The raw material for creating Polybend in any plastic film waste. Thanks to innovations, like Polyblend.
